section.label: Chef's Table
section.description: Savor an exquisite culinary journey crafted by Chef Hiroshi, our Michelin-starred maestro, at the exclusive Chef's Table.

item.label: Sakura Symphony Omakase
item.description: Discover the art of Omakase with our Sakura Symphony, curated by Chef Hiroshi, where you entrust the chef to craft a bespoke dining experience, guiding you through the essence of cherry blossoms with each exquisite dish.

section.label: Drinks
section.description: Elevate your dining experience with carefully curated beverages to complement your Omakase journey.

item.label: Sakura Blossom Tea
item.description: Fragrant green tea infused with cherry blossoms, served hot or cold.

modifierGroup.label: How would you like your tea?

item.label: Oyu (Hot)
item.description: Indulge in the comforting warmth of fragrant green tea infused with delicate cherry blossoms, offering a soothing accompaniment to your meal.

item.label: Hiya (Cold)
item.description: Refresh your palate with the crisp and invigorating flavors of chilled green tea infused with delicate cherry blossoms, perfect for enjoying on a warm day.

item.label: Sakura Sake
item.description: Premium sake infused with cherry blossom petals.

modifierGroup.label: How much sake do you want?

item.label: Tokkuri (Small Flask)
item.description: A single-serving flask of premium sake infused with the essence of cherry blossoms, perfect for savoring the flavors of the season.

item.label: Chokkari (Medium Flask)
item.description: A medium-sized flask of premium sake, ideal for sharing and enhancing the culinary journey with friends or loved ones.

item.label: Otokka (Large Flask)
item.description: A generous flask of premium sake, symbolizing celebration and joy, to elevate your dining experience to new heights.
